title: Mini-Ep 188: To Pee or Not to Pee
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 188: To Pee or Not to Pee
itunes:subtitle: Kate suffers from pee performance anxiety while on a short road trip and Doree successfully turns in a final draft of her book! Then, listeners call in about eyebrow maintenance, face picking, thigh chafing solutions, and setting work boundaries.&n...
description:
Kate suffers from pee performance anxiety while on a short road trip and Doree successfully turns in a final draft of her book! Then, listeners call in about eyebrow maintenance, face picking, thigh chafing solutions, and setting work boundaries. 


Activity of the Day: Watch every Grammy performance


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

 

This week’s episode is sponsored by:

FLEXFIT - Visit Flexfits.com/forever35 and use code FOREVER35 for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits or 10% off your first Flex Cup
